author: szetszwo
msg: HADOOP-8330. Update TestSequenceFile.testCreateUsesFsArg() for HADOOP-8305.  Contributed by John George

author: veithen
msg: Improving the JSON code - Step 1 - Respect contracts: Axiom is about XML and nothing else. In particular OMDataSource#serialize(OutputStream, OMOutputFormat) and OMDataSource#serialize(Writer, OMOutputFormat) are expected to produce XML, not JSON nor anything else.
Also simplified the OMDataSource implementation by using an appropriate base class provided by Axiom.
